data.actual_result: App freezes (might freeze for only 3 seconds but could be longer).
data.expected_result: You seamlessly rejoin the video call.
data.short_description: Disconnecting and reconnecting to video call while camera swaps causes app to freeze.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join/Start a video call. - Enable your camera. - Spam the swap camera button a couple of times (Just enough so that it takes a few seconds to swap cameras). - Disconnect from the call. - Reconnect to the call.
